dmca.title: Prior User Fights Back
dmca.body:
http://groups.msn.com/philagora/logique.msnw?action=get_message&mview=0&ID_Message=23&LastModified=4675399633841414678&all_topics=1 for the original French text

Sent: 11/24/2002 8:09 AM

Translation:

<<Good Day,

We discover that your philosophical newsgroup bears the name Philagora.

We are specifically informing you that Philagora is a trade mark, deposited with INPI [National Institute of Industrial Property].

We were not informed about it [sic]. We are demanding that the name be changed as soon as possible.

The Philagora Team
philagora@philagora.net
http://philagora.net/ >>

******************
RESPONSE OF RECIPIENT
******************

I checked: the official publication of the trade-mark "Philagora" in the Gazette Officielle was dated September  6, 2002 (see http://www.philagora.net/philag.htm ) - but our MSN Group Philagora was created on July 20, 2002, before the official notice of the trademark's deposit

[private]

[private]
